title: 820-01987 20V on charger but not booting.
message:
Fairly clean board, had a tiny amount of corrosion around R7101 but nothing major.

Mac came in booting up but customer said it would some times shutdown, it booted about 3 times then it shutdown and it no longer boots up.

I get 0.8V on PPVCC_S0_CPU for about 10 seconds, CPU heats up a bit then Mac shuts down again, I can repeat that if I unplug and re-plug the charger, this is the same case with or without battery connected.

title: 820-01987 20V on charger but not booting.
message: Yes we did the revive option and passed all the way but same thing.

title: 820-01987 20V on charger but not booting.
message:
Test the board disconnecting all the cables.
Keep only charger; try also connecting the battery.

title: 820-01987 20V on charger but not booting.
message: Charger alone, same thing, charger and battery I see the charger going up to 2A but nothing changes, I left the charger on for a while to see if it made a difference later on but nothing.

title: 820-01987 20V on charger but not booting.
message:
Check if all components surrounding U7100 are good.
Also check solders and traces.
Test removing C7101.
May need to change U7100 even...

title: 820-01987 20V on charger but not booting.
message:
Removed C7101 same thing, checked the resistors and caps around U7100 all OK and last I replaced U7100 and nothing changed.

Ended up restoring T2 completely but same thing, at no point I have USB activity, however the trackpad does click.

Any last suggestions will be greatly appreciated.

title: 820-01987 20V on charger but not booting.
message:
Trackpad click is not life sign.
Force feedback appears once actuators get power.

Tried known good battery for sure?
Does it charge its original battery?

title: 820-01987 20V on charger but not booting.
message:
Yes battery is good, in fact I used this case to test another MBP that had bad battery and it worked here fine.

I can see the charger take almost 2A when the battery is connected and board remains cool, when charger is disconnected ppbus is 11.4V
